faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the free trial work?
faq.a1: You get 15 days to try SARTORIA with up to 5 garments per category and access to Today's Outfit. If you like it, subscribe to unlock all features and unlimited wardrobe. If not, cancel before it ends and you won't be charged.
faq.a2: Yes, no commitments. Cancel from your profile. Your subscription stays active until the end of the paid period.
faq.q3: What happens to my data if I cancel?
faq.a3: Your data is kept. If you resubscribe, everything will be as you left it.
faq.q4: Does it work with women's clothing?
faq.a4: Currently optimized for men's fashion. We're working on the women's version.
faq.q5: Do I need to upload my entire wardrobe?
faq.a5: It's not mandatory, but the more items you upload, the better and more varied the combinations.
